message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price of $14,000. I think you'll love it!
Alice, your offer is a bit high for my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $10,000 for it. Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $10,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. Let me know if that works for you.

Alice, I understand your position, but $12,500 is still above what I can afford right now. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. This would be a fair price for both of us, and it would allow me to purchase the product within my budget.

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $13,000. That's my minimum price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer you $12,750. It's a great deal for both of us!
